Question
========
Which of the following is the correct expression for the Lorentz factor?

Answerlist
----------
* $(1 - v^2 / c^2)^{-1/2}$
* $(1 - v^2 / c^2)^{1/2}$
* $(1 + v^2 / c^2)^{-1/2}$
* $(1 + v^2 / c^2)^{1/2}$


Solution
========
The Lorentz factor is defined to be

$$ \gamma = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 - v^2 / c^2}} = (1 - v^2 / c^2)^{-1/2} $$
